name: DarknessGame-TheHorde
description:
DARKNESS GAME - THE HORDE

Language : FR / EN

you will have to survive waves of zombies in a maze of rooms, the question is how long will you hold out in this hostile environment. 

Your only friend will be 3 weapons :

* Pistol

* Shotgun

* Rifle

You will have to manage your hunger, your thirst and pay attention to your only source of light, your flashlight.
